root.name: year()

example.code: d = day() # Values from 1 - 31 m = month() # Values from 1 - 12 y = year() # 2003, 2004, 2005, etc. print(d) print(m) print(y)

root.description: Processing communicates with the clock on your computer. The year() function returns the current year as an integer (2003, 2004, 2005, etc).
